thread.title: Ghaleb Khallouf
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Ghaleb Khallouf

author: Ghaleb Khallouf
title: Ghaleb Khallouf
text: I have had gr8 experience with every single person at pop yachts staff they are friendly / they know what customers want & honestly you feel like you dealing with family members, up to this moment they've been gr8 to deal with and can't wait to receive the boat but will give another review when I do!
